captions.text: [MUSIC PLAYING]
-Hey, guys.
It's Brooklyn and Bailey.

And today, we are going to show
you guys like a one minute clip

on "Nick News" with
Linda Ellerbee.

And we were offered this
chance to be on Web Stars Two.
And we did it.
And it was a lot of fun.
They came to our house.
They filmed us.
They interviewed us.

-It was like the
best experience ever.
And then it aired TV.

But not all of you
got to see that.

And so we finally got permission
to show you a small clip.
It's not the entire video.
But it's a small clip.

And then we'll have a link
in the description box
that you guys can click.

And click this link
here in this box too

if you want to see
the entire video.

-I'm Brooklyn and
this is Bailey.
And we're 13 years old.
And we're from Dallas, Texas.
-Filming is like our life.

It's always kind
of been our life.
We grew up with that.

-Our family has a web show
called Cute Girls Hairstyles
that started in 2009.
And we were nine years old.

We just usually stayed
silent most the time,

because we were the models
for our mom's hairstyles.

-A lot of the viewers were
asking about our personalities

and what we liked, and what
clothes and fashion and nails
we did.

So we decided to
start our own show.

-I hope you guys
enjoyed that video.

I know we had a
lot of filming it.

-It was a huge privilege
being able to do that
with "Nick News."

And we're so glad that we had
the opportunity to do that.

And there is also
a comment section.

If you click on the link
and watch the video,

you can say like hey,
Brooklyn and Bailey sent us

or whatever you want to
say, like review the video.

Whatever works for
you guys, But don't

forget to leave a comment
below there on the link.

And we'll see you
guys next week.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
-Look at that funny face.
-Did you get it.
-Yeah, I got it that time.
Brooklyn, what are you doing?

title: Watch Brooklyn and Bailey on Nick News' "Webstars II"
